name: Taxi Driver 3D Cab Parking Sim
description:
Modern Taxi School Parking 3D is a taxi games in which you need to learn how to park.You will require you to show top skills in steering, acceleration, and obstacle avoidance to get those vehicles parked in parking places.Your precision driving skills will be tested and pushed to the limit.After playing this game you become parking master.

Game Features:
• Realistic physics control
• Smooth steering control with hydraulic break and acceleration paddle
• Challenging levels
• HD graphics
